game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is plagued by a terrible curse that causes all living things to slowly wither away.
game.ending: The protagonist, a young apprentice, discovers the source of the curse and defeats the dark sorcerer responsible, restoring magic to the world.
game.synopsis: "The Lost Art" follows the journey of a young apprentice as they navigate treacherous landscapes, battle fearsome creatures, and unravel ancient mysteries in search of a way to revive the dying world. Along the way, they discover hidden strengths, forge unexpected alliances, and confront the dark secrets of their own past.
game.title: The Lost Art
